methods.comment:
* ComponentName of Parent Consent activity for testing Biometric authentication disabled by * Parental Controls. * *

Component could be defined by values of {@link #TEST_ALWAYS_REQUIRE_CONSENT_PACKAGE} and * {@link #TEST_ALWAYS_REQUIRE_CONSENT_CLASS} Secure settings.
